text: int compadj ( int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] , int n ) { int i ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ n ] [ i + 1 ] > a [ n ] [ i ] ) a [ n ] [ i ] = a [ n ] [ i + 1 ] ; } } main ( ) { int t , n , j , i , a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- > 0 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } for ( i = n - 1 ; i >= 0 ; i -- ) { compadj ( a , i ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < i ; j ++ ) { a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] = a [ i - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ i ] [ j ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; } }
